metadata.name: Bypass UAC via Fodhelper.exe
metadata.comment: Identifies use of Fodhelper.exe to bypass User Account Control. Adversaries use this technique to execute privileged processes.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\fodhelper.exe')))

output.summary: Identifies use of Fodhelper.exe to bypass User Account Control. Adversaries use this technique to execute privileged processes.

metadata.objective: Examine fields: ComputerName, actor.user.name, process.cmd_line False positive: Legitimate use of fodhelper.exe utility by legitimate user References: https://eqllib.readthedocs.io/en/latest/analytics/e491ce22-792f-11e9-8f5c-d46d6d62a49e.html, https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1548.002/T1548.002.md
